meanings.sent1: She symmetrized the drawing by adding the same details on both sides.
meanings.sent2: The artist symmetrized the painting by balancing the colors and shapes.
meanings.sent3: The cat symmetrized its nap position by stretching out its legs evenly.
meanings.sent4: The garden symmetrized itself as the flowers bloomed in perfect pairs.
meanings.sent5: The mirror symmetrized her reflection, showing an exact copy of herself.

meanings.sent1: He symmetrized the room by placing identical chairs on each side of the table.
meanings.sent2: The designer symmetrized the pattern by repeating the same motif throughout the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The chef symmetrized the dish by arranging the ingredients in a mirror image.
meanings.sent4: The music symmetrized the atmosphere, bringing harmony to the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The architect symmetrized the building, ensuring balance in every aspect of the design.
